<div style="margin-left:1px; border:2px dotted #9292FF; padding:0 1ex;">


'''Jpowder''' is an open-source charting software for displaying powder diffraction data.[[File:JpowderLogo.png|right|Jpowder Plots]] It is a collaborative project between the ISIS Facility of the STFC Rutherford Appleton Laboratory and the E-Learning and Software Develepment Unit of the Kasem Bundit University.
